title: Pathogenic UNC13A variants cause a neurodevelopmental syndrome by impairing synaptic function - PubMed
description: The UNC13A gene encodes a presynaptic protein that is crucial for setting the strength and dynamics of information transfer between neurons. Here we describe a neurodevelopmental syndrome caused by germline coding or splice-site variants in UNC13A. The syndrome presents with variable degrees of deve …
